questions.describe: When should a system administrator consider using the Salesforce AppExchange? (Choose 2)

answerOptions.describe: To submit ideas for Salesforce application enhancements
To find answers to Salesforce application questions
When looking for pre-built custom applications and tools
When standard Salesforce functionality needs to be extended

questions.describe: A marketing user has received a file of leads to import into Salesforce. What is the best way to avoid duplicating records?

answerOptions.describe: Merge Leads Function
Validation rules
Import Wizard
Data Loader

questions.describe: A user profile has login hour restrictions set to Monday through Friday 8am to 5pm. The user logged in at 4:30 pm on a Tuesday and it is now 5:01 pm. Which behavior of the application should the user expect?

answerOptions.describe: The user will be able to continue working and start new sessions
The user will be logged out and any unsaved work in progress will be lost
The user will be logged out and any unsaved work in progress will be saved
The user will be able to continue working, but will be unable to start any new sessions

questions.describe: Sales management at Universal Containers is requesting better visibility into specific types of sales deals. They need to be notified when opportunities worth a large amount are close to closing. They would also like to receive a list of opportunities that are still open past the close date. Which feature can a system administrator use to accomplish this? (Choose 2)

answerOptions.describe: Big deal alerts
Opportunity Escalation Rules
Opportunity update reminders
Opportunity field history tracking

questions.describe: When can a validation rule be used to prevent invalid data?(Choose 3)

answerOptions.describe: When records are deleted by a user
When records are edited by a user
When records are submitted using web-to-lead
When records are updated by a workflow rule
When records are imported

questions.describe: What should a system administrator consider when setting up Mobile Lite? (Choose 2)

answerOptions.describe: Mobile Lite users must have a mobile license assigned to them
Mobile Lite provides access to standard objects and dashboards
Mobile Lite configurations can be created for each user
Mobile Lite must be enabled before users can install it

questions.describe: Which type of chart can be used to display summary values from two different levels of grouping in a report?(Choose 2)

answerOptions.describe: Stacked bar chart
Funnel chart
Donut chart
Grouped line chart

questions.describe: Which accounts are automatically synchronized on Salesforce Classic Lite?

answerOptions.describe: All recently accessed accounts
Accounts selected with the sync button
Accounts that the user owns
Any account created in the last 30 days

questions.describe: Which permission is required to install and uninstall packages from Salesforce AppExchange?

answerOptions.describe: Create AppExchange Packages
Manage Package Licenses
Upload AppExchange Packages
Download AppExchange Packages

questions.describe: What user interface setting must be enabled for users to edit records in a list view?(Choose 2)

answerOptions.describe: Enhanced page layout editor
Enhanced lists
Enhanced profile list views
Inline editing

questions.describe: Which task can a delegated administrator perform? (Choose 3)

answerOptions.describe: Log in as a user who has granted login access
Reset passwords for all users
Create new user profiles
Manage users within specified roles
Manage specified custom objects

questions.describe: Which schedule type can be defined for a product? (Choose 2)

answerOptions.describe: Quantity
Forecast
Revenue
Production

questions.describe: How can a sales user relate an opportunity to a campaign? (Choose 2)

answerOptions.describe: Use the campaign influences related list on the opportunity
Select the primary campaign source for the opportunity
Select the campaign record type when creating the opportunity
Use the campaign hierarchy related list on the opportunity

questions.describe: Universal Containers set the Organization-Wide Defaults for accounts to public read/write. The sales management team is importing a new set of account records and needs to limit access to them. Access should be restricted to the account owner and members of a public group. How can this be accomplished?

answerOptions.describe: Update the organization - wide defaults for accounts to private and create a sharing rule for the group.
Create a sharing rule to grant access to members of the public group.
Manually share each account record with members of the public group.
Upgrade the role hierarchy and assign members of the group to a role at the top of the hierarchy.

questions.describe: Universal Containers is capturing a percentage discount directly on an opportunity record. Sales management needs to include the discounted opportunity amount in pipeline reports. How can the system administrator make the discounted amount available?

answerOptions.describe: Create an auto-number field to calculate the discounted amount.
Create a formula field to calculate the discounted amount.
Create a roll-up summary field to calculate the discounted amount.
Create a cross object formula field to calculate the discounted amount.

questions.describe: Which setting can a system administrator control in the Salesforce user interface? (Choose 3)

answerOptions.describe: Enable hover details
Enable spell checker
Enable enhanced list views
Enable Chatter for specific users
Enable customizable recent items

questions.describe: Universal Containers has set the organization-wide default settings for accounts to private. Amy and bob are on separate sales teams, but are assigned tot he same role in the hierarchy. Amy is a member of the "Sales West" public group and needs access to all accounts owned by Bob, a member of the "Sales East" group. How would an administrator grant Amy access to only Bob's accounts?

answerOptions.describe: Add Amy to the "Sales East" public group
Add Amy to Bob's default account team
Create a sharing rule between the "Sales West" and "Sales East" public groups
Add Amy to the role above Bob in the role hierarchy

questions.describe: Which record type can be updated when converting a lead? (Choose 2)

answerOptions.describe: An existing custom object record
An existing opportunity record
An existing contact record
An existing account record

questions.describe: Which functionality is available when customizing tasks? (Choose 2)

answerOptions.describe: Record types can be created for tasks
Validation rules can be created for tasks
Roll-up summary fields can be created for tasks
Recurring tasks can be assigned to more than one user

questions.describe: What can an administrator assign to both Ideas and Answers?

answerOptions.describe: Status
Sharing Rules
Categories
Workflow Rules

questions.describe: Which statement about formula fields is true? (Choose 2)

answerOptions.describe: Formula fields are read-only on record detail pages
Formula fields can reference fields on a child object
Formula fields can reference themselves in the formula
Formula fields can reference fields on a parent object

questions.describe: Which statement about public groups is true? (Choose 2)

answerOptions.describe: Public groups can be used in sharing rules
Public groups allows users to delete personal accounts
Public groups can be used when manually sharing a record
Public groups can be created by any user

questions.describe: Universal Technology sells software and consulting services. The software sales team uses a different set of sales stages than the consulting services team. How can a system administrator set up the process? (Choose 2)

answerOptions.describe: Use a validation rule to prevent the software from access the services team's sales process
Create a record type for each sales process and assign it to the appropriate profiles
Create a separate lead process for the software sales team and service sales team
Create a unique list of opportunity stage picklist values for each sales process

questions.describe: A system administrator at Universal containers incorrectly imported a set of records and needs to remove them from Salesforce. Which tool should the administrator use to complete the task? (Choose 2)

answerOptions.describe: Import Wizard
Mass Delete
Excel Connector
Data Loader

questions.describe: What determines whether a user can create a new record using a specific record type?

answerOptions.describe: Profile
. Sharing
Page layout
Field level security

questions.describe: Universal Finance has segmented its customer base into two categories: High Wealth and Retirement. High Wealth accounts should be visible to High Wealth Sales team members only. Retirement accounts should be visible to all sales users. How can a system administrator meet this requirement?

answerOptions.describe: Set the organization-wide default sharing to public read-only and create a sharing rule to limit access to High Wealth accounts
Create a new profile for Retirement Sales team members and remove read access to High Wealth account records.
Set the organization-wide default sharing to private and create a sharing rule to share Retirement accounts with all Sales users
Create a new record type for high Wealth accounts and share the record type with High Wealth sales team members

questions.describe: Which statement about Mobile Lite is true? (Choose 2)

answerOptions.describe: It must be enabled by an administrator
It is available to customer portal users
It is available to users without a mobile license
It is available to partner portal users

questions.describe: A marketing user has received a file of leads to import into Salesforce. What is the best way to avoid duplicating records?

answerOptions.describe: Merge Leads Function
Import Wizard
Validation rules
Data Loader

questions.describe: A marketing manager needs to view summary metrics across a set of related campaigns. How can this be accomplished?

answerOptions.describe: Establish the campaign influence between related campaigns
Build a lead source report to summarize the campaign metrics
Create a cross object formula field to calculate summary metrics
Create a campaign hierarchy and include the related campaigns

questions.describe: What does the report type determine when a new report is created? (Choose 3)

answerOptions.describe: The default columns in the report

The fields available to include in the report
C Whether the report will be tabular, summary, or matrix
The object included in the report
Whether the report can be displayed in a dashboard
